fields.label: 1. Disable Scroll Overlay Effect
fields.name: disable_scroll_effect
fields.instructions: Note: the following effect will work only in Chrome, Firefox and Edge browsers.

fields.label: 2. Display Header
fields.name: display_header
fields.instructions: If you use this option please remove the Header Placeholder Block to avoid it's duplication.

sub_fields.label: 3.1.3. Sticky Menu
sub_fields.name: flo-lovely2-header__sticky-header
sub_fields.instructions: This feature keeps the Menu locked to the top of the page at all times.

sub_fields.label: A. Logo
sub_fields.message: Check the following tutorial to learn about the logo options.

fields.label: 4. Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions:
This image will be cropped to the following resolutions:
Large Devices: 2560px width/height auto;
Tabled Devices: 2048px width/height auto;
Mobile Devices: 1280px width/height auto;

fields.label: A.1. Contact Form Description: Left Side
A.1.2. Title paragraph
fields.name: title_paragraph
fields.default_value: Thus, gentle reader, I have given thee a faithful history of my travels for sixteen years and above seven months: wherein I have not been so studious of ornament as of truth. I could, perhaps, like others, have astonished thee with strange improbable tales.

fields.label: A.1.3. Scroll Down Label
fields.name: scroll_down_label
fields.instructions: This label will scroll down to the Contact Form when clicked.

fields.label: A.2. Contact Form Description: Right Side
A.2.3. Display Social Links
fields.name: display_social_links
fields.instructions: Display the social links set up in 7. Generics Settings -> 7.1. Social Media.

fields.label: B.2. Form Subtitle
fields.name: form_subtitle
fields.default_value: WED LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU

fields.label: B.8. Contact Form Shortcode
fields.name: contact_form_shortcode
fields.instructions: To use a custom contact form, add your shortcode here. We suggest using Flo Forms plugin, you can also use CF7, and Ninja forms, however we are not responsible for trouble shooting issues with 3rd party plugins.

fields.label: B.8.3. Your Email
fields.name: your_email
fields.instructions: This is the email where the enquires will be sent.

fields.label: B.8.4. Use Reply To Header
fields.name: use_reply_to_header
fields.instructions: The reply to header allows you to reply directly to the clients email. However this option can send your email to spam, or it can get blocked by your hosting provider. If your emails aren't sending, turn this option off and test again. Check the tutorial for more details.
